name: Dragonoid
description: A powerful dragon warrior of fire, known for its incredible strength and burning spirit.

attack.name: Boosted Dragon
attack.description: Channels the primal power of ancient dragons into a devastating fire blast that grows stronger with each consecutive use.

attack.name: Fire Tornado
attack.description: Creates a massive vortex of flames that pulls in enemies while bombarding them with superheated air and molten debris.

defense.name: Dragon Shield
defense.description: Manifests the scales of an elder dragon as an impenetrable defense, growing stronger when health is low.

defense.name: Flame Armor
defense.description: Wraps the body in dragon fire that acts as both armor and weapon, burning enemies that attempt close combat.

healing.name: Dragon Heart
healing.description: Taps into the immortal essence of dragons to rapidly regenerate health and temporarily boost all abilities.
